SELECT s.`id`, s.email, s.`password`, s.salt, s.store_id, s.staff_level, s.created_time, s.modified_time, sh.`id` AS sh_id, sh.`name` AS sh_name, sh.manager AS sh_manager, sh.phone AS sh_phone, sh.address AS sh_address, sh.created_time AS sh_created_time, sh.modified_time AS sh_modified_time FROM staff s LEFT JOIN shop sh ON s.store_id = sh.`id`
CONCAT_WS("",s.email,sh.name,sh.manager,sh.phone) LIKE CONCAT(#{search})
